abstract: Toyota has released music sporadically, but now it will sponsor a full campaign of record releases, videos and tour support for about 20 acts.
snippet: Toyota has released music sporadically, but now it will sponsor a full campaign of record releases, videos and tour support for about 20 acts.
lead_paragraph: A crowd of young music fans gathered outside the Roxy Theater in Hollywood one Saturday afternoon recently, jostling for free T-shirts. As Repulsion, a band of the grisly heavy-metal style known as grindcore, blasted through songs like “Pestilent Decay” and “Splattered Cadavers,” dozens of fans on their way in and out of the club scooped up the garments, printed with a gory design typical of the genre.

headline.main: Backing Indie Bands to Sell Cars
headline.print_headline: Backing Indie Bands To Sell Cars
